example.parse: (TOP (S (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN_PROP اِسْرائِيل)) (NP (DEM_PRON_FS دِي))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG مِستَقوِيَّة) (NP (NOUN نَفْس) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (PP (PREP عَلَى) (NP (DET+ADJ الفاضِي)))) (PP-PRP (PREP لِ) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أَنّ) (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_3FS ها)) (ADJP-PRD (PRT (NEG_PART مِش)) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG شايْفَة) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG وَقْفَة)) (PP (PREP مِن) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN الشَعْب)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON اللِي)) (S (VP (PRT (PROG_PART بِ)) (IV3FS+IV تَطَّهِد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NP (IVSUFF_DO:3MS ُه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1)))))))))))))))
